thread.title_full: @SC_Varsity Highlights of the Day for Oct. 4

title: @SC_Varsity Highlights of the Day for Oct. 4
text: @SC_Varsity Highlights of the Day for Oct. 4 Comment Posted Oct. 4, 2015 at 8:16 PM Posted Oct. 4, 2015 at 8:16 PM Â» Social News Follow us on Twitter to get story updates, sports scores and highlights of the day! @SCTSPORTS Follow us on Twitter for all the latest insight from our team of professional beat writers and award-winning columnists! HIGH SCHOOLS Apponequet boys soccer wins The Lakers boys soccer team scored two goals within a minute late in the first half to come from behind and beat Dighton-Rehoboth 2-1 at home on Sunday. ... Down 1-0, Gabot Macuch got the scoring going off an assist from Alex Lopes. Less than a minute later, Macuch assisted on Dylan Panaggio's goal. Both came off corner kicks. ... "We did a really good job being aggressive, which provided two really good opportunities for us to put it in," coach Trevor Gagnier said. "It was an even second half; both teams had opportunities. It was a good win." ... Apponequet (4-2-1, 4-2-1 SCC) host Wareham today. Lakers girls tie D-R On a windy day, the Apponequet girls soccer team played to a 0-0 tie with Dighton-Rehoboth, the first blemish on the Lakers' record (6-0-1). ... "We dominated most of the game," coach Robin Ireland said. "We hit the post, we hit the bar. We had some good breakaways that we should have scored, but we didn't get the bounces today." ... Macy Parisee made four saves for the clean sheet. ... Apponqeuet plays at Wareham today. TODAY'S GAMES Fairhaven at New Bedford - 3:30 p.m. Blue Hills at Westport - 3 p.m. Boys Soccer Seekonk at Fairhaven - 4 p.m. Bishop Feehan at GNB Voc-Tech - 4 p.m. Wareham at Apponequet - 3:30 p.m Old Colony at Avon - 3:30 p.m. Taunton at New Bedford - 6 p.m. Old Rochester at Bourne - 3:30 p.m. Field Hockey New Bedford at Old Rochester - 4 p.m. Wareham at Fairhaven - 3:30 p.m. Apponequet at Dighton-Rehoboth - 3:30 p.m. Girls Soccer Taunton at New Bedford - 4 p.m. Bourne at Old Rochester - 6:30 p.m. GNB Voc-Tech at Diman Voke - 4 p.m. Avon at Old Colony - 3:30 p.m. Fairhaven at Seekonk - 3:30 p.m. Westport at Bristol-Plymouth - 3:30 p.m. Apponequet at Wareham - 3:30 p.m. Girls Volleyball Apponequet at Wareham - 6 p.m. Fairhaven at Seekonk - 6 p.m. New Bedford at Bishop Stang - 6:30 p.m. Bourne at Old Rochester - 6 p.m. Avon at Old Colony - 5 p.m. Diman Voke at GNB Voc-Tech - 6 p.m. RED SOX Drop season finale The Red Sox closed out their season with a disappointing sweep at the hands of the Indians. Cleveland finished it off on Sunday with a 3-1 victory. Boston's offense went cold over the final days of the season. In losing their final four games of the season, the Red Sox scored a total of four runs. Their only tally on Sunday came when Xander Bogaerts and David Ortiz doubled consecutively in the first inning. Ortiz then made the final out of the inning by attempting to steal third. Ortiz finished the year with a .913 OPS, 37 home runs and 108 RBI. southcoasttoday.com
